Try rearranging the trigrams to form a phrase telling you the answer to this subpuzzle.
Each subpuzzle answer will give you one letter of the final answer. What strange property do all the subpuzzle answers have?
A better title for this puzzle might be "for your Is Only".
Look at the Is and Os in the answer to each subpuzzle. You will need to interpret this as a binary number and convert it to a letter.
